data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Fortaleza.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a Internacional throw-in in Fortaleza's half.
Fortaleza have a goal kick.
In the minute 2, Can Internacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fortaleza's half?
Marielson Alves Silva awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
Internacional to take a throw-in in Fortaleza territory.
In the minute 5, Corner awarded to Internacional.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Marielson Alves Silva.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 9, Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Marielson Alves Silva.
Can Fortaleza capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Internacional's half?
Marielson Alves Silva waits before resuming play because Marcelo Lomba for Internacional is still down.
In the minute 11, Marcelo Lomba has recovered and rejoins the match in Fortaleza.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Fortaleza awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 12, Internacional to take a throw-in in Fortaleza territory.
Can Internacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fortaleza's half?
Marielson Alves Silva awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 14, Internacional are pushing forward but Leandro Fernandez's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fortaleza.
Fortaleza are coming forward and Romarinho gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 15, Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 17, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Internacional at Estadio Castelao.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in the half of Internacional.
In the minute 19, Fortaleza have a dangerous throw-in.
Fortaleza's Felipe breaks free at Estadio Castelao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Internacional at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 20, Throw-in Internacional.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Fortaleza.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 23, Throw-in Fortaleza.
In Fortaleza Internacional attack through Leandro Fernandez. The finish is off target, however.
Fortaleza have a goal kick.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 26, Felipe is back on the pitch.
Felipe is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Rogerio Ceni (Fortaleza) is making a first substitution, with Jackson replacing Juan Quintero.
In Fortaleza Internacional's Leandro Fernandez is caught offside.
Attention is being given to Internacionalâ€™s Patrick and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 30, Marielson Alves Silva signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Internacional's half.
Marlon (Fortaleza) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 30, Goal kick for Internacional at Estadio Castelao.
It seems as if Patrick is unable to continue. Nonato replaces him for the away team.
Marielson Alves Silva awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 33, Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Free kick Internacional.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 38, Johnny (Internacional) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a Internacional throw-in in Fortaleza's half.
In the minute 40, Can Internacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fortaleza's half?
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Leo Ferreira (Internacional) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 43, Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
Throw-in for Internacional at Estadio Castelao.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fortaleza.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Fortaleza.
The second half has started at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 46, Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a throw-in for Fortaleza, close to Internacional's area.
Eduardo Coudet is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Castelao with Andres D'Alessandro replacing Johnny.
Marielson Alves Silva awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Internacional in the half of Fortaleza.
In the minute 48, At Estadio Castelao, Juninho has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Fortaleza have a goal kick.
In the minute 49, The match at Estadio Castelao has been interrupted briefly for a check on Damian Musto, who is down injured.
Internacionalâ€™s Damian Musto is on his feet again at Estadio Castelao.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
In the minute 54, Internacional to take a throw-in in Fortaleza territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in the half of Internacional.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Internacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Fortaleza.
In the minute 59, Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
Free kick Internacional.
Throw-in high up the field for Internacional in Fortaleza.
In the minute 61, Rodrigo Moledo of Internacional gets in a strike, but is off target.
Marielson Alves Silva awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
Internacional's Leandro Fernandez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
Marielson Alves Silva awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
Important block from the Fortaleza defence as Leo Ferreira fires in a strike for Internacional.
In the minute 64, Internacional have been awarded a corner by Marielson Alves Silva.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Andres D'Alessandro (Internacional) has received a yellow card from Marielson Alves Silva.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Fortaleza in the half of Internacional.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Internacional's half.
Internacional needs to be cautious. Fortaleza have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 66, Felipe is on target to give Fortaleza a 1-0 advantage.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
Can Fortaleza get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
In the minute 68, In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fortaleza.
Goal kick for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 70, Leo Ferreira is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Free kick in a good position for Fortaleza!
Nonato (Internacional) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 73, Abel Hernandez is replacing Leandro Fernandez for Internacional at Estadio Castelao.
Gabriel Boschilia (Internacional) has replaced the possibly injured Leo Ferreira.
Felipe's header is off-target for Fortaleza.
In the minute 74, Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
Fortaleza's Osvaldo is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Fortaleza in the half of Internacional.
In the minute 76, Gabriel Boschilia for Internacional has been booked by Marielson Alves Silva and receives a first yellow card.
The home team replace Wellington Paulista with Ronald.
Fortaleza make their third substitution with Yuri Cesar replacing Osvaldo.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
Internacional have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 79, Internacional drive upfield and Damian Musto gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Fortaleza defender.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Marielson Alves Silva.
Damian Musto (Internacional) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 80, Internacional have been awarded a corner by Marielson Alves Silva.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 83, Abel Hernandez for Internacional gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Fortaleza have a goal kick.
Franco Rodrigo Fragapane is replacing David for the home team.
In the minute 83, The home team have replaced Romarinho with Tiago Orobo. This is the fifth substitution made today by Rogerio Ceni.
Throw-in for Fortaleza close to the penalty box.
Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
Fortaleza are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 85, Eduardo Coudet is making the team's fifth substitution at Estadio Castelao with Rodrigo Lindoso replacing Nonato.
Fortaleza drive forward but Tiago Orobo is judged offside.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
Ball safe as Fortaleza is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
8 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Internacional will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Fortaleza.
Felipe (Fortaleza) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Fortaleza surge into the attack at Estadio Castelao but Tiago Oroboâ€™s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Internacional.
Marielson Alves Silva awards the home team a throw-in.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fortaleza pushes forward through Yuri Cesar, whose finish on goal is saved.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Goal kick for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
That's full-time at Estadio Castelao. The final score is 1-0.
